video_description:
Video review of the Lenovo THinkPad tablet, perhaps the best 10 inch Android tablet for enterprise and business use, because of its reliability, solid body, ports, extra features and bundled software.

More details on httP://www.tabletbite.com
title: Lenovo ThinkPad tablet review - Android tablet for business and enterprise use

comments.text: You aren't able to figure out how to go back from the settings widget?  how about you push the HOME button on the widget?  It was painful to watch you not find such an obvious link back.  You should become familiar with the device before you preview it on video.﻿
comments.author: JMYoungNJ
